note.p: German astrophysicist. Studied at Leipzig. Director of the observatory of F. G. von Bülow at Bothkamp, near Kiel, 1870. A member of the British eclipse expedition to Sicily, 1870. Worked on spectroscopic analysis of the stars. Observer at the astrophysical observatory at Potsdam, 1874; professor, 1879; director, 1882.
